Question
========
This file contains the grades of first year psychology students from the cohort 2010-2011 on the exams of courses 1.1 through 1.7 (variables: course1_3 to course1_7) at the Erasmus University. How many students scored 3.9 or lower on 3 or more out of the 7 course exams ? Write your answer in the answer box (with 0 decimal places).

**Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-260-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-260-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 249.
